biotools.summary: Program for Bayesian inference and model choice across a wide range of phylogenetic and evolutionary models. It uses Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) methods to estimate the posterior distribution of model parameters.

bioschemas.name: MrBayes
bioschemas.summary: Program for Bayesian inference and model choice across a wide range of phylogenetic and evolutionary models. It uses Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) methods to estimate the posterior distribution of model parameters.
